Consulting

For organizations looking to ship exceptional products

Product
Strategy

Bring clarity to the mission, vision, and strategy for your product, from customer-centric product definition to go-to-market planning.

Product
Planning

Near- and long-term roadmapping, requirements definition, and prioritization so you can focus on building the right product with the least time.

Product
Operations

Optimize your delivery and iteration by improving the processes and removing the roadblocks that keep you and your product team from shipping.

Coaching

For individual product managers looking to reach their full potential

Competency
Assessment

You can’t improve what you don’t measure. Complete a competency assessment against a proprietary performance rubric to see where you can improve.

Personalized
Growth Planning

Custom-formulate growth plan with actionable near- and long-term goals based on the competency assessment.

Job Search
& Interview

Increase your chances of scoring an interview or landing that dream job with resume reviews, interview prep, and role-specific job search guidance.
